private_information: I am truck0
I can drive between any two places
Driving takes 10 time units
While driving I am not at any place
truck0.goal: Assist in transporting crates to meet the global crate placement goals.

private_information: I am truck1
I can drive between any two places
Driving takes 10 time units
While driving I am not at any place
truck1.goal: Assist in transporting crates to meet the global crate placement goals.

private_information: I am hoist0
I am located at depot0
I can lift, putdown, load, and unload crates
Lifting lasts 1 time unit, putdown lasts 1, load lasts 3, unload lasts 4
I must remain at my place during actions that require me
hoist0.goal: Assist in manipulating crates at depot0 to meet the global crate placement goals.

private_information: I am hoist1
I am located at depot1
I can lift, putdown, load, and unload crates
Lifting lasts 1 time unit, putdown lasts 1, load lasts 3, unload lasts 4
I must remain at my place during actions that require me
hoist1.goal: Assist in manipulating crates at depot1 to meet the global crate placement goals.

I must remain at my place during actions that require me
hoist2.goal: Assist in manipulating crates at depot2 to meet the global crate placement goals.

I can lift, putdown, load, and unload crates
Lifting lasts 1 time unit, putdown lasts 1, load lasts 3, unload lasts 4
I must remain at my place during actions that require me
hoist3.goal: Assist in manipulating crates at distributor0 to meet the global crate placement goals.

I must remain at my place during actions that require me
hoist5.goal: Assist in manipulating crates at distributor2 to meet the global crate placement goals.

private_information: I coordinate planning and produce a PDDL domain and problem
I must respect private constraints of trucks and hoists
Objective is to minimize total time
orchestrator.goal: Coordinate trucks and hoists to achieve the environment goals while respecting agent constraints and minimizing total time.

public_information: There are places: depots 0..2 and distributors 0..2
Trucks can drive between places and take 10 time units per drive
Hoists are location-fixed and perform lifting, putting down, loading, and unloading
Lifting lasts 1, putdown 1, load 3, unload 4 time units
Crates and pallets are surfaces; crates can be on pallets or other crates
Trucks are the only movers between places; hoists perform all crate manipulations

orchestrator.system_prompt: You are an expert with multi-agent temporal PDDL problems. You will be provided information about the environment and the capabilities and knowledge of the agents which interact in the environment. You always provide a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file that describes the planning problem. Enclose the pddl domain between <domain></domain> tags, and the pddl problem between <problem></problem> tags. Keep the actions for different agent types distinct, name truck drive actions separately from hoist actions, and include appropriate temporal qualifiers (at start, over all, at end) to model durations and invariants. Respect the given action durations and agent constraints. The plan metric should minimize total time.
orchestrator.prompt:
Your name is orchestrator.
Initial information about the environment: {environment->init}.
Goal for the environment: {environment->goal}.
The public information is: {environment->public_information}.
The trucks' constraints are: {agents->agent_details->truck0->private_information} and {agents->agent_details->truck1->private_information}.
The hoists' constraints are: {agents->agent_details->hoist0->private_information}, {agents->agent_details->hoist1->private_information}, {agents->agent_details->hoist2->private_information}, {agents->agent_details->hoist3->private_information}, {agents->agent_details->hoist4->private_information}, {agents->agent_details->hoist5->private_information}.
Think step by step and provide a PDDL domain and problem that encapsulate the integrated temporal model, respecting the constraints of each agent and the provided initial state and goals. Do not make assumptions beyond the given information. There is no need for anything else beyond producing the pddl files.
